# Python. Basic tasks

## 01
* GPS time roll over
* ISBN with missing number

## 02
* The Temperature Converter
* The Electricity Tariff Calculator
* The Time Duration Converter

## 03
* The Temperature Converter
* The Prime Number Checker
* The Perfect Number Finder

## 04
* The Password Validator
* The Armstrong Number Checker
* String Compression

## 05
* Analyse number in a loop if it's prime, perfect or armstrong

## 06
* Look-and-Say Sequence. Start with any positive integer. The next number in the sequence is generated by counting and describing consecutive digits of the current number.
